      • addSensor

        public boolean addSensor(edu.ma02.core.interfaces.ISensor is)
                  throws edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException,
                         edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException
        Adds a new sensor to the station
        Specified by:
        addSensor in interface edu.ma02.core.interfaces.IStation
        Parameters:
        is - instance to be inserted
        Returns:
        1.true if the sensor was inserted in the collection storing all sensors

        2.false if the sensor already exists

        Throws:
        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException - if the @param sensor is null
        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException - if the sensorId is invalid (i.e. less or more than 10 characters)

      • addMeasurement

        public boolean addMeasurement(java.lang.String string,
                              double d,
                              java.time.LocalDateTime ldt,
                              java.lang.String string1)
                       throws edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException,
                              edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException,
                              edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException
        Adds a new measurement to a sensor
        Specified by:
        addMeasurement in interface edu.ma02.core.interfaces.IStation
        Parameters:
        string - id identifying the sensor
        d - measurement value
        ldt - measurement date
        string1 - measurement unit for which the value was recorded
        Returns:
        1.true if the measurement was inserted in the collection storing all sensors

        2.false if the measurement already exists

        Throws:
        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.StationException - if:

        1.the sensor doesn't exists

        2.any parameter is null

        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.SensorException - if the @param unit is not compatible with the unit pre-defined for the sensor
        edu.ma02.core.exceptions.MeasurementException - uncatched from measurement if the value is -99
